content.text:
# Friern Barnet (ward)

Friern Barnet is an electoral ward in the London Borough of Barnet. The ward was first used in the 2022 elections. It elects three councillors to Barnet London Borough Council.
Geography
The ward is named after the suburb of Friern Barnet.
